body_html:
Just a quick note about the implementation strategy: sumproduct_pair actually is a building block for the einsum implementation.
The slowdown mentioned above is against the crafted unrolled version in the orgininal PR / the version in 0.3.1. The implementation as is is a lot faster and memory efficient than the one currently in master.

body:
Just a quick note about the implementation strategy: sumproduct_pair actually is a building block for the einsum implementation.
The slowdown mentioned above is against the crafted unrolled version in the orgininal PR / the version in 0.3.1. The implementation as is is a lot faster and memory efficient than the one currently in master.
